Topic.Title: Any way to alphabetize the pages in gamebook mode?

Posts.EditableText: Over on the lefthand side in gamebook mode the pages come up in the order you create them (or in the order you put them into a folder).  Is there any way to sort them with out doing it one by one?  Thanks in advance!
Posts.HTML: Over on the lefthand side in gamebook mode the pages come up in the order you create them (or in the order you put them into a folder). Is there any way to sort them with out doing it one by one? Thanks in advance!
